instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: Measure Resistance To Ground?
threads.message:
Hi everyone, which is the correct way to measure resistance to ground for a COIL?

Is it BLACK PROBE on ground or RED PROBE on ground?

threads.title: Measure Resistance To Ground?
threads.message:
Always measure with red probe to ground.
Many times also need to check inverting probes; but red to ground is first reading we always look...

When you get very low value (i.e. 001-010) in diode mode, then switch to ohm mode.
In such case, doesn't matter probes orientation...
